aircraft.value: Griffin Guard - AC-7829-153 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Pump cavitation noise observed. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 16/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 17/06/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 21/06/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 22/06/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 22/06/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
